questions.question: Choose your favourite group of villagers amongst the following groups

answers.content: Down-to-earth types like Flurry, Maple and Pate who are steady and comforting
NPC’s like Blanca, Celeste and Sahara who bring a unique flair to the game
Tom Nook, Reese and Cyrus, Cyrus because they provide players with customisation options for home and specialty items
Cute villagers that remind you of food like Chai, Chrissy and Marshal

questions.question: Have you downloaded the recent Happy Home Paradise DLC?

answers.content: Sure did! I couldn’t wait to explore new items
I did because I was excited about the prospect of different seasons for vacation homes within the archipelago
Yes because I was curious to see what items and customisations I could create for villagers
I’ll get to it sometime

questions.question: 3. How do you feel about the weekly Happy Home Academy assessments?

answers.content: 1. I’m relaxed about it because I’m pretty handy with decorating my house
I get excited about displaying seasonal items I crafted
I look forward to confidently displaying customisations of items
So-so, it would be nice if food items from cooking and baking got more points!

questions.question: 4. Do you have an area on your island dedicated to farming?

answers.content: I have a big fruit orchard  with a few other basic crops like pumpkins and wheat
I farm according to in-game seasons, like growing pumpkins for Halloween
I focus more on trading items that I can later customise myself
I have extensive farmlands with a variety of crops for making cooking ingredients

questions.question: Do you have a designated DIY set-up on your island?

answers.content: I do, because my friends often visit my island so that I can craft items for them
My DIY bench ‘floats’ around my island depending on the time of year
3. I have a DIY area in my house with lots of customisation kits on hand
The kitchen is my studio where I get to make culinary recipes

questions.question: Do you have a collection of materials for DIY’s?

answers.content: I have a bit of everything on hand
I like to stow away seasonal materials like cherry blossom petals, mushrooms and shells
I can’t say that I do
My storage s filled with harvested food items like bamboo, carrots and sugar bags

results.All Rounder: You are a DIY all rounder who’s always prepared for a project!
results.Expert: You are an expert in collecting seasonal materials for seasonal DIY’s!
results.Customiser: You are a Customiser who has every gyroid in every colour!
results.Aspiring: You are constantly expanding your Cooking and Baking DIY repertoire!
